parameters: \msgwidth[auto]\c[18]”Well then, I’ll kill you however you want to.\.
Now, suffer and break into pieces, feel the pain until your very last breath leaves your body!”\c[0]
1 접근2 아이스볼 앞회피 아이스볼 앞회피 검공격
패턴4 순간이동 후 검 공격 or 런던론도
패턴4 순간이동 후 검 공격 or 런던론도
패턴4 순간이동 후 검 공격 or 런던론도
\n<\c[30]Id\c[0]>”In the end,\. it turned out like this, huh.”
\n<\c[30]Id\c[0]>”…Ah,\.\. is this the ‘true regret’ mentioned by Ione back then?”
\n<\c[30]Id\c[0]>”What are you doing?\.\. Why are you just looking at me like that?”
So please,\.\. just end it all for me…”
\bust[1]\bustExp[1,2]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”We’ve been having such a hard time, right?”
\msgwidth[auto]\bustExp[1,6]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>"It's been real nightmare. Maybe this isn't what Alma wanted."
\bustExp[1,0]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”From now on, I won’t leave you alone anymore. I’ll be here for you.”
\bustExp[2,2]\n<\c[30]Id\c[0]>”Hah,\.\. even after everything you’ve done to me,\.\. you’re selfish as ever…”
\bustExp[2,0]\n<\c[30]Id\c[0]>”Do you know what you’re talking about right now?\. What you’ve chosen is going to be more painful than dying.”
And it’s probably going to be worse than that time.”
\bustExp[1,2]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”But it’s okay,\. because now, you have me.”
\bustExp[1,6]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>"And, as you know, we promised Alma."
\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>"Make sure to write a diary before sleep. \.\.Don't forget it, \.right?"
